MemberSignature.Value: public static void ActiveTexture (OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All texture);
.method public static hidebysig void ActiveTexture(valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All texture) cil managed

param.name: texture
param.para: Specifies which texture unit to make active. The number of texture units is implementation dependent, but must be at least two. texture must be one of GL_TEXTURE, where i ranges from 0 to the larger of (GL_MAX_TEXTURE_COORDS - 1) and (GL_MAX_COMBINED_TEXTURE_IMAGE_UNITS - 1). The initial value is GL_TEXTURE0.

Docs.summary: Select active texture unit

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BlendEquationSeparate (OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All modeRGB, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All modeAlpha);
.method public static hidebysig void BlendEquationSeparate(valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All modeRGB, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All modeAlpha) cil managed

param.name: modeRGB
param.para: specifies the RGB blend equation, how the red, green, and blue components of the source and destination colors are combined. It must be GL_FUNC_ADD, GL_FUNC_SUBTRACT, GL_FUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACT, GL_MIN, GL_MAX.

param.name: modeAlpha
param.para: specifies the alpha blend equation, how the alpha component of the source and destination colors are combined. It must be GL_FUNC_ADD, GL_FUNC_SUBTRACT, GL_FUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACT, GL_MIN, GL_MAX.

Docs.summary: Set the RGB blend equation and the alpha blend equation separately

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BlendFunc (OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All sfactor, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All dfactor);
.method public static hidebysig void BlendFunc(valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All sfactor, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All dfactor) cil managed

param.name: sfactor
param.para: Specifies how the red, green, blue, and alpha source blending factors are computed. The following symbolic constants are accepted: GL_ZERO, GL_ONE, GL_SRC_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR, GL_DST_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR, GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA, GL_DST_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA, GL_CONSTANT_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_COLOR, GL_CONSTANT_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_ALPHA, and GL_SRC_ALPHA_SATURATE. The initial value is GL_ONE.

param.name: dfactor
param.para: Specifies how the red, green, blue, and alpha destination blending factors are computed. The following symbolic constants are accepted: GL_ZERO, GL_ONE, GL_SRC_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR, GL_DST_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR, GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA, GL_DST_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA. GL_CONSTANT_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_COLOR, GL_CONSTANT_ALPHA, and GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_ALPHA. The initial value is GL_ZERO.

Docs.summary: Specify pixel arithmetic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BlendFuncSeparate (OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All srcRGB, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All dstRGB, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All srcAlpha, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All dstAlpha);

.method public static hidebysig void BlendFuncSeparate(valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All srcRGB, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All dstRGB, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All srcAlpha, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All dstAlpha) cil managed

param.name: srcRGB
param.para: Specifies how the red, green, and blue blending factors are computed. The following symbolic constants are accepted: GL_ZERO, GL_ONE, GL_SRC_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR, GL_DST_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR, GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA, GL_DST_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA, GL_CONSTANT_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_COLOR, GL_CONSTANT_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_ALPHA, and GL_SRC_ALPHA_SATURATE. The initial value is GL_ONE.

param.name: dstRGB
param.para: Specifies how the red, green, and blue destination blending factors are computed. The following symbolic constants are accepted: GL_ZERO, GL_ONE, GL_SRC_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR, GL_DST_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR, GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA, GL_DST_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA. GL_CONSTANT_COLOR, GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_COLOR, GL_CONSTANT_ALPHA, and GL_ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_ALPHA. The initial value is GL_ZERO.

param.name: srcAlpha
param.para: Specified how the alpha source blending factor is computed. The same symbolic constants are accepted as for srcRGB. The initial value is GL_ONE.

param.name: dstAlpha
param.para: Specified how the alpha destination blending factor is computed. The same symbolic constants are accepted as for dstRGB. The initial value is GL_ZERO.

Docs.summary: Specify pixel arithmetic for RGB and alpha components separately

param.name: target
param.para: Specifies the target buffer object. The symbolic constant must be GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, GL_PIXEL_PACK_BUFFER, or GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER.

param.name: size
param.para: Specifies the size in bytes of the buffer object's new data store.

param.name: usage
param.para: Specifies the expected usage pattern of the data store. The symbolic constant must be GL_STREAM_DRAW, GL_STREAM_READ, GL_STREAM_COPY, GL_STATIC_DRAW, GL_STATIC_READ, GL_STATIC_COPY, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW, GL_DYNAMIC_READ, or GL_DYNAMIC_COPY.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void CompressedTexImage2D (OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All target, int level, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All internalformat, int width, int height, int border, int imageSize, IntPtr data);

.method public static hidebysig void CompressedTexImage2D(valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All target, int32 level, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All internalformat, int32 width, int32 height, int32 border, int32 imageSize, native int data) cil managed

param.name: target
param.para: Specifies the target texture. Must be GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_PROXY_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_X, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Y, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Y, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Z, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Z, or GL_PROXY_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP.

param.name: level
param.para: Specifies the level-of-detail number. Level 0 is the base image level. Level n is the nth mipmap reduction image.

param.name: internalformat
param.para: Specifies the format of the compressed image data stored at address data.

param.name: width
param.para: Specifies the width of the texture image including the border if any. If the GL version does not support non-power-of-two sizes, this value must be 2 sup n + 2 ( border ) for some integer . All implementations support 2D texture images that are at least 64 texels wide and cube-mapped texture images that are at least 16 texels wide.

param.name: height
param.para: Specifies the height of the texture image including the border if any. If the GL version does not support non-power-of-two sizes, this value must be Must be 2 sup n + 2 ( border ) for some integer . All implementations support 2D texture images that are at least 64 texels high and cube-mapped texture images that are at least 16 texels high.

param.name: border
param.para: Specifies the width of the border. Must be either 0 or 1.

param.name: imageSize
param.para: Specifies the number of unsigned bytes of image data starting at the address specified by data.

param.name: data
param.para: Specifies a pointer to the compressed image data in memory.

Docs.summary: Specify a two-dimensional texture image in a compressed format

param.name: target
param.para: Specifies the target texture. Must be GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_PROXY_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_X, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Y, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Y, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Z, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Z, or GL_PROXY_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP.

param.name: level
param.para: Specifies the level-of-detail number. Level 0 is the base image level. Level n is the nth mipmap reduction image.

param.name: internalformat
param.para: Specifies the format of the compressed image data stored at address data.

param.name: width
param.para: Specifies the width of the texture image including the border if any. If the GL version does not support non-power-of-two sizes, this value must be 2 sup n + 2 ( border ) for some integer . All implementations support 2D texture images that are at least 64 texels wide and cube-mapped texture images that are at least 16 texels wide.

param.name: height
param.para: Specifies the height of the texture image including the border if any. If the GL version does not support non-power-of-two sizes, this value must be Must be 2 sup n + 2 ( border ) for some integer . All implementations support 2D texture images that are at least 64 texels high and cube-mapped texture images that are at least 16 texels high.

param.name: border
param.para: Specifies the width of the border. Must be either 0 or 1.

param.name: imageSize
param.para: Specifies the number of unsigned bytes of image data starting at the address specified by data.

param.name: data
param.para: Specifies a pointer to the compressed image data in memory.

Docs.summary: Specify a two-dimensional texture image in a compressed format

.method public static hidebysig void CopyTexImage2D(valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All target, int32 level, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All internalformat, int32 x, int32 y, int32 width, int32 height, int32 border) cil managed

param.name: target
param.para: Specifies the target texture. Must be GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_X, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Y, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Y, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Z, or GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Z.

param.name: level
param.para: Specifies the level-of-detail number. Level 0 is the base image level. Level n is the nth mipmap reduction image.

param.name: internalformat
param.para: Specifies the internal format of the texture. Must be one of the following symbolic constants: GL_ALPHA, GL_ALPHA4, GL_ALPHA8, GL_ALPHA12, GL_ALPHA16, GL_COMPRESSED_ALPHA, GL_COMPRESSED_LUMINANCE, GL_COMPRESSED_LUMINANCE_ALPHA, GL_COMPRESSED_INTENSITY, GL_COMPRESSED_RGB, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT16, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT24, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT32, GL_LUMINANCE, GL_LUMINANCE4, GL_LUMINANCE8, GL_LUMINANCE12, GL_LUMINANCE16, GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA, GL_LUMINANCE4_ALPHA4, GL_LUMINANCE6_ALPHA2, GL_LUMINANCE8_ALPHA8, GL_LUMINANCE12_ALPHA4, GL_LUMINANCE12_ALPHA12, GL_LUMINANCE16_ALPHA16, GL_INTENSITY, GL_INTENSITY4, GL_INTENSITY8, GL_INTENSITY12, GL_INTENSITY16, GL_RGB, GL_R3_G3_B2, GL_RGB4, GL_RGB5, GL_RGB8, GL_RGB10, GL_RGB12, GL_RGB16, GL_RGBA, GL_RGBA2, GL_RGBA4, GL_RGB5_A1, GL_RGBA8, GL_RGB10_A2, GL_RGBA12, GL_RGBA16, GL_SLUMINANCE, GL_SLUMINANCE8, GL_SLUMINANCE_ALPHA, GL_SLUMINANCE8_ALPHA8, GL_SRGB, GL_SRGB8, GL_SRGB_ALPHA, or GL_SRGB8_ALPHA8.

param.name: x
param.para: Specify the window coordinates of the lower left corner of the rectangular region of pixels to be copied.

param.name: width
param.para: Specifies the width of the texture image. Must be 0 or 2 sup n + 2 ( border ) for some integer .

param.name: height
param.para: Specifies the height of the texture image. Must be 0 or 2 sup m + 2 ( border ) for some integer .

param.name: border
param.para: Specifies the width of the border. Must be either 0 or 1.

Docs.summary: Copy pixels into a 2D texture image

MemberSignature.Value: public static void GetTexParameter (OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All target, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All pname, ref int params);
.method public static hidebysig void GetTexParameter(valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All target, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All pname, int32 params) cil managed

param.name: target
param.para: Specifies the symbolic name of the target texture. GL_TEXTURE_1D, GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_3D, and GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP are accepted.

param.name: pname
param.para: Specifies the symbolic name of a texture parameter. GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_LOD, GL_TEXTURE_MAX_LOD, GL_TEXTURE_BASE_LEVEL, GL_TEXTURE_MAX_LEVEL, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_R, GL_TEXTURE_BORDER_COLOR, GL_TEXTURE_PRIORITY, GL_TEXTURE_RESIDENT, GL_TEXTURE_COMPARE_MODE, GL_TEXTURE_COMPARE_FUNC, GL_DEPTH_TEXTURE_MODE, and GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP are accepted.

param.name: params
param.para: Returns the texture parameters.

Docs.summary: Return texture parameter values

MemberSignature.Value: public static void PixelStore (OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All pname, int param);
.method public static hidebysig void PixelStore(valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All pname, int32 param) cil managed

param.name: pname
param.para: Specifies the symbolic name of the parameter to be set. Six values affect the packing of pixel data into memory: GL_PACK_SWAP_BYTES, GL_PACK_LSB_FIRST, GL_PACK_ROW_LENGTH, GL_PACK_IMAGE_HEIGHT, GL_PACK_SKIP_PIXELS, GL_PACK_SKIP_ROWS, GL_PACK_SKIP_IMAGES, and GL_PACK_ALIGNMENT. Six more affect the unpacking of pixel data from memory: GL_UNPACK_SWAP_BYTES, GL_UNPACK_LSB_FIRST, GL_UNPACK_ROW_LENGTH, GL_UNPACK_IMAGE_HEIGHT, GL_UNPACK_SKIP_PIXELS, GL_UNPACK_SKIP_ROWS, GL_UNPACK_SKIP_IMAGES, and GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT.

param.name: param
param.para: Specifies the value that pname is set to.

Docs.summary: Set pixel storage modes

MemberSignature.Value: public static void PolygonOffset (float factor, float units);
.method public static hidebysig void PolygonOffset(float32 factor, float32 units) cil managed

param.name: factor
param.para: Specifies a scale factor that is used to create a variable depth offset for each polygon. The initial value is 0.

param.name: units
param.para: Is multiplied by an implementation-specific value to create a constant depth offset. The initial value is 0.

Docs.summary: Set the scale and units used to calculate depth values

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ReadPixels (int x, int y, int width, int height, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All format, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All type, IntPtr pixels);

.method public static hidebysig void ReadPixels(int32 x, int32 y, int32 width, int32 height, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All format, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All type, native int pixels) cil managed

param.name: x
param.para: Specify the window coordinates of the first pixel that is read from the frame buffer. This location is the lower left corner of a rectangular block of pixels.

param.name: width
param.para: Specify the dimensions of the pixel rectangle. width and height of one correspond to a single pixel.

param.name: format
param.para: Specifies the format of the pixel data. The following symbolic values are accepted: GL_COLOR_INDEX, GL_STENCIL_INDEX, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, GL_RED, GL_GREEN, GL_BLUE, GL_ALPHA, GL_RGB, GL_BGR, GL_RGBA, GL_BGRA, GL_LUMINANCE, and GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA.

param.name: type
param.para: Specifies the data type of the pixel data. Must be one of GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_BYTE, GL_BITMAP, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT, GL_SHORT, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, GL_INT, GL_FLOAT, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE_3_3_2, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE_2_3_3_REV, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_5_6_5, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_5_6_5_REV, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_4_4_4_4, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_4_4_4_4_REV, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_5_5_5_1, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_1_5_5_5_REV, GL_UNSIGNED_INT_8_8_8_8, GL_UNSIGNED_INT_8_8_8_8_REV, GL_UNSIGNED_INT_10_10_10_2, or GL_UNSIGNED_INT_2_10_10_10_REV.

Docs.summary: Read a block of pixels from the frame buffer

MemberSignature.Value: public static void StencilFunc (OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All func, int ref, int mask);
.method public static hidebysig void StencilFunc(valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All func, int32 ref, int32 mask) cil managed

param.name: func
param.para: Specifies the test function. Eight symbolic constants are valid: GL_NEVER, GL_LESS, GL_LEQUAL, GL_GREATER, GL_GEQUAL, GL_EQUAL, GL_NOTEQUAL, and GL_ALWAYS. The initial value is GL_ALWAYS.

param.name: ref
param.para: Specifies the reference value for the stencil test. ref is clamped to the range [0, 2 sup n - 1], where is the number of bitplanes in the stencil buffer. The initial value is 0.

param.name: mask
param.para: Specifies a mask that is ANDed with both the reference value and the stored stencil value when the test is done. The initial value is all 1's.

Docs.summary: Set front and back function and reference value for stencil testing

MemberSignature.Value: public static void TexImage2D (OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All target, int level, int internalformat, int width, int height, int border, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All format, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All type, IntPtr pixels);

.method public static hidebysig void TexImage2D(valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All target, int32 level, int32 internalformat, int32 width, int32 height, int32 border, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All format, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All type, native int pixels) cil managed

param.name: target
param.para: Specifies the target texture. Must be GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_PROXY_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_X, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Y, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Y, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Z, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Z, or GL_PROXY_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP.

param.name: level
param.para: Specifies the level-of-detail number. Level 0 is the base image level. Level n is the nth mipmap reduction image.

param.name: width
param.para: Specifies the width of the texture image including the border if any. If the GL version does not support non-power-of-two sizes, this value must be 2 sup n + 2 ( border ) for some integer . All implementations support texture images that are at least 64 texels wide.

param.name: height
param.para: Specifies the height of the texture image including the border if any. If the GL version does not support non-power-of-two sizes, this value must be 2 sup m + 2 ( border ) for some integer . All implementations support texture images that are at least 64 texels high.

param.name: border
param.para: Specifies the width of the border. Must be either 0 or 1.

param.name: format
param.para: Specifies the format of the pixel data. The following symbolic values are accepted: GL_COLOR_INDEX, GL_RED, GL_GREEN, GL_BLUE, GL_ALPHA, GL_RGB, GL_BGR, GL_RGBA, GL_BGRA, GL_LUMINANCE, and GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA.

param.name: type
param.para: Specifies the data type of the pixel data. The following symbolic values are accepted: GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_BYTE, GL_BITMAP, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT, GL_SHORT, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, GL_INT, GL_FLOAT, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE_3_3_2, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE_2_3_3_REV, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_5_6_5, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_5_6_5_REV, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_4_4_4_4, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_4_4_4_4_REV, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_5_5_5_1, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_1_5_5_5_REV, GL_UNSIGNED_INT_8_8_8_8, GL_UNSIGNED_INT_8_8_8_8_REV, GL_UNSIGNED_INT_10_10_10_2, and GL_UNSIGNED_INT_2_10_10_10_REV.

Docs.summary: Specify a two-dimensional texture image

MemberSignature.Value: public static void VertexAttribPointer (int indx, int size, OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All type, bool normalized, int stride, IntPtr ptr);
.method public static hidebysig void VertexAttribPointer(int32 indx, int32 size, valuetype OpenTK.Graphics.ES20.All type, bool normalized, int32 stride, native int ptr) cil managed

param.name: size
param.para: Specifies the number of components per generic vertex attribute. Must be 1, 2, 3, or 4. The initial value is 4.

param.name: type
param.para: Specifies the data type of each component in the array. Symbolic constants GL_BYTE, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_SHORT, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT, GL_INT, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, GL_FLOAT, or GL_DOUBLE are accepted. The initial value is GL_FLOAT.

param.name: normalized
param.para: Specifies whether fixed-point data values should be normalized (GL_TRUE) or converted directly as fixed-point values (GL_FALSE) when they are accessed.

param.name: stride
param.para: Specifies the byte offset between consecutive generic vertex attributes. If stride is 0, the generic vertex attributes are understood to be tightly packed in the array. The initial value is 0.

Docs.summary: Define an array of generic vertex attribute data

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Viewport (int x, int y, int width, int height);
.method public static hidebysig void Viewport(int32 x, int32 y, int32 width, int32 height) cil managed

param.name: x
param.para: Specify the lower left corner of the viewport rectangle, in pixels. The initial value is (0,0).

param.name: width
param.para: Specify the width and height of the viewport. When a GL context is first attached to a window, width and height are set to the dimensions of that window.

Docs.summary: Set the viewport
